entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the best in the year at Defense Against the Dark Arts. He is also credited with saving the Stone from You-Know-Who.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who has beaten Harry in a test, but also acknowledges that Harry is the best at Defense Against the Dark Arts.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who doubts Harry's ability to teach and makes a joke about Goyle concentrating.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as an example of someone who concentrates in a silly way.
